messageBody:
Thanks Robert. I have one more question

For testing a servlet can I just go ahead with Junit to start with or
use even httpunit also ?

Thanks
Anand

--- In junit@y..., Robert Watkins <robertw@q...> wrote:
> Anand wrote:
> > Any pointers as to where should I start ?
> > I have 3 methods in my Servlet which I would like to test.
> > Where do I start ?
>
> I would start by reading the supplied documentation.
>
> Once you've done that, create a TestCase. Create testMethods that
create an
> instance of your servlet and invoke one (or more) of the methods in
your
> servlet. Verify that the results you get match what you expect.
>
> Robert.
